flawed_nl_solution:
At the end of 2018, the tree will grow 100 x 10/100 = <<100*10/100=10>>10 meters more.
Thus, its height at the end of 2018 is 100 + 10 = <<100+10=114>>114 meters.
At the end of 2019, the tree will grow 114 x 10/100 = <<114*10/100=57/5>>57/5 meters more.
So, its height at the end of 2019 is 114 + 57/5 = <<114+57/5=627/5>>627/5 meters.
Therefore, the tree has grown 627/5 - 100 = <<627/5-100=127/5>>127/5 meters.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 110, not 114. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
